name: How to ruin your life in 48 hours
name_original: How to ruin your life in 48 hours
description:
HOW TO RUIN YOUR LIFE IN 48 HOURS! –You can try yourself as LD game developer

48 hours, Only You and LD …. or NOT?

You have so many friends, relatives, daily tasks to do – you’re just a human being, and everything gets in the way of developing a game. So what will you sacrifice - your basic human needs or the game? 

 

Any action takes time and affects the end of the game development. Will you be a game developer, will you have a healthy relationship, or maybe ... find the time for everything? 

Eat, drink, sleep, answer calls and most importantly, do not forget about the game, because you have only 48 hours before the release.

 

Controls

W/A/S/D – Movement

E – Select Items

Q – Select Phone

Left Mouse Button – Click

Credits
